text: Berlin is in Germany is a 2001 German drama film directed by Hannes Stöhr. Hannes Stöhr's first cinema feature, the film won the Panorama Audience award at the International Berlin Filmfestival 2001, the German critics association award, the Studio Hamburg award, and many others. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:2001 drama films Category:German films Category:German drama films
title: Berlin is in Germany
